attributes.action: Publish John Lyon's second report into Shahid Malik's expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why has John Lyon's report into Shahid Malik's expenses not been disclosed? Considering Mr. Malik's questionable expenses surely this report should be transparent and open to public scrutiny.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
